/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Modern skyscrapers tower over older, more traditional structures, reflecting the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant energy.
